text: Chichꞌobꞌo ri kꞌutuꞌn chirij ri ucheꞌal ri higos. Are keraxar ri uqꞌabꞌ, kekꞌiy loq ri uxaq, iwetaꞌm chi xqebꞌ loq ri qꞌalaj.13:28 Pa kaxlaꞌn tzij ri tzij verano are ri saqꞌij man kajunumataj ta kꞌu kukꞌ ri kitzijobꞌal ri aꞌj Israel rumal chi ri verano are ri qꞌalaj. 13:28 Mateo 24:36; Hechos 1:6-7.
